p: Pandemic vaccination status was generally poorly recorded. Fifty-four pregnant women were admitted prior to the 23rd October 2009 and would either not have had the opportunity to be vaccinated or would not have seroconverted (even if vaccinated) prior to illness onset. Of the remaining 28, only two (7%) were reported to have received the vaccine, whereas seven (25%) were reported not to have received it (missing data = 19).
